original_title: Zombie Atrocity: The Italian Zombie Movie - Part 2
overview: When his twin brother is brutally murdered, a brave soldier, a sexy psychic, an evil succubus, her oafish boyfriend, two mysterious aliens and the Michigan Militia inadvertently combine forces in a landfill of the living dead.

production_companies.name: Cult of Moi and Vous Film Producioni Company

tagline: When the dead eat...you're dead meat!
title: Zombie Atrocity: The Italian Zombie Movie - Part 2
